items.title: After 40 years on the run, escaped prisoner located and caught
items.description: A man who escaped a Puerto Rican prison nearly 40 years ago was taken into custody in Florida, according to the Lee County Sheriff's Office.

items.title: WATCH:  How social media helped fuel a female mechanic's business
items.description: ABC News' Will Ganss is here with the story about Desiree Hill who found a massive online community when switching from nursing to auto work.
